title: Python matrix_dataset vector input should be column matrix
description: R matrix_dataset accepts 1D vectors as column matrices via as.matrix(). Python currently reshapes 1D arrays to 1xN rows using np.atleast_2d, causing run_length mismatches and incorrect orientation. Fix by reshaping 1D inputs to (-1,1) and adding regression coverage.

title: Clarify fmri_dataset deprecated backend argument contract
description: When fmri_dataset was called with scans as file paths and deprecated `backend` argument set to a non-storage object (e.g. "nifti"), function continued into backend_open and emitted generic Invalid backend object error. This is now a clearer stop: backend must be storage_backend object when supplied. Added regression test in test_additional_cases.R and validated with devtools::load_all + testthat::test_file.
